meanings.definition: A bitter alkaloid found in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: The brucines in the plant give it a bitter taste.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of brucines on human health.
meanings.sent3: The brucines in the salad made it taste so bitter, it was like eating medicine!
meanings.sent4: Her words were laced with brucines, leaving a bitter aftertaste in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The smell of brucines in the air warned us of the poisonous plant nearby.

meanings.sent1: The store had run out of brucines, so I couldn't buy any.
meanings.sent2: She collected different types of brucines for her science project.
meanings.sent3: The brucines on the shelf looked like tiny, colorful candies.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with jars of brucines, each labeled with a different plant name.
meanings.sent5: The brucines on the table caught the sunlight, creating a beautiful display of colors.
